sample_docs: Let's Show You What Wink Can Do Ready to see how Wink can power your login, checkout, or fraud prevention strategy? In this personalized 30-minute demo, we'll show you exactly how Wink works—whether you're looking to modernize authentication, streamline payments, or reduce fraud. No pitch deck. Just real product, real use cases. Biometric login and checkout Real-time age verification AI-powered fraud detection Modular payment infrastructure Paze, loyalty, and orchestration integrations Request a Demo Call Thank you! Why Merchants Choose Wink 1 Modular Payments + Identity Wink delivers a unified platform that combines biometric identity, payment gateway control, and real‑time intelligence—letting you launch fast, scale cleanly, and manage your brand with confidence. 2 AI-Driven Fraud Defense Stop fraud before it happens. Our AI-powered risk engine analyzes device, behavioral, and biometric signals in real time. 3 Seamless Developer Experience Use Wink's developer-friendly APIs, pre-built components, and SDKs to integrate fast with less code and full customization control. Why Merchants Choose Wink Wink delivers a unified platform that combines biometric identity, payment gateway control, and real‑time intelligence—letting you launch fast, scale cleanly, and manage your brand with confidence. Stop fraud before it happens. Our AI-powered risk engine analyzes device, behavioral, and biometric signals in real time. Use Wink's developer-friendly APIs, pre-built components, and SDKs to integrate fast with less code and full customization control.

Discover how this merger combines innovative payment tech and trusted infrastructure for a seamless, scalable business experience. Discover how this merger combines innovative payment tech and trusted infrastructure for a seamless, scalable business experience. WINK Identity WINK Checkout Tailored Experiences for Your Unique Needs Wink's flexible platform lets you choose the features that matter most to your business, whether it's biometric authentication, secure payments, age verification, or advanced fraud protection. Streamline operations and deliver frictionless, trusted experiences for your customers. As your business grows, scale seamlessly to improve security, drive higher conversions, and reduce operational complexity—keeping you ahead in a rapidly changing digital landscape. Just wink Next-Level Biometric Security, You Can Trust Our encryption technology sets a new standard. It's anonymous, it's multi-layered. Wink's industry-first multi-factor biometric authentication combines the convenience and security of face recognition with enhanced voice recognition and palm scanning. Our patented one-way anonymous encryption ensures full privacy protection, as your Wink ID is represented by a unique 3D model of numbers and characters derived from your face and voice data that cannot be decrypted. Biometric Boost Conversions with Checkout CoPilot + Integration With Wink's Checkout CoPilot and seamless Pazeâ" integration, access over 150 million pre-loaded credit and debit cards from participating banks and credit unions. This one-of-a-kind service simplifies guest transactions, helping to lead to higher conversion rates and reducing the need for manual data entry. Enhanced with Visa and Mastercard tokenization, it provides transactions with added security because your card numbers aren't shared with merchants, helps reduce fraud, and helps minimize cart abandonment. copilot + paze Drive Growth – Across Every Channel, On Any Device Wink's cutting-edge, device-agnostic technology works seamlessly across any camera-enabled device, from mobile phones and iPads to kiosks, POS systems, and in-store setups. Whether online, in-store, or mobile, our streaming video-based checkout establishes a direct, encrypted connection between the shopper's device and the Wink cloud, eliminating the risk of data theft, eavesdropping, or malware. With multi-factor biometric authentication, including Face ID, AI, and machine learning, we offer the ultimate in security and convenience. This disruptive technology ensures the safest and most seamless checkout experience across all channels, empowering your business to thrive in the evolving digital landscape. Device Integration is as easy as smiling at someone The Wink platform isn't just simple and quick to use, it's also swift and seamless to integrate across all of your favorite platforms. Compatible with major e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Magento, BigCommerce and others. Whether your shoppers use your mobile app or internet website, our No Code/Low Code model makes it easy to get up and running in no time at all. Integration Tailored Experiences for Your Unique Needs Wink's flexible platform lets you choose the features that matter most to your business, whether it's biometric authentication, secure payments, age verification, or advanced fraud protection. Streamline operations and deliver frictionless, trusted experiences for your customers. As your business grows, scale seamlessly to improve security, drive higher conversions, and reduce operational complexity—keeping you ahead in a rapidly changing digital landscape. Next-Level Biometric Security, You Can Trust Our encryption technology sets a new standard. It's anonymous, it's multi-layered. Wink's industry-first multi-factor biometric authentication combines the convenience and security of face recognition with enhanced voice recognition and palm scanning. Our patented one-way anonymous encryption ensures full privacy protection, as your Wink ID is represented by a unique 3D model of numbers and characters derived from your face and voice data that cannot be decrypted. Boost Conversions with Checkout CoPilot + Integration With Wink's Checkout CoPilot and seamless Pazeâ" integration, access over 150 million pre-loaded credit and debit cards from participating banks and credit unions. This one-of-a-kind service simplifies guest transactions, helping to lead to higher conversion rates and reducing the need for manual data entry. Enhanced with Visa and Mastercard tokenization, it provides transactions with added security because your card numbers aren't shared with merchants, helps reduce fraud, and helps minimize cart abandonment. Drive Growth – Across Every Channel, On Any Device Wink's cutting-edge, device-agnostic technology works seamlessly across any camera-enabled device, from mobile phones and iPads to kiosks, POS systems, and in-store setups. Whether online, in-store, or mobile, our streaming video-based checkout establishes a direct, encrypted connection between the shopper's device and the Wink cloud, eliminating the risk of data theft, eavesdropping, or malware. With multi-factor biometric authentication, including Face ID, AI, and machine learning, we offer the ultimate in security and convenience. This disruptive technology ensures the safest and most seamless checkout experience across all channels, empowering your business to thrive in the evolving digital landscape. Integration is as easy as smiling at someone The Wink platform isn't just simple and quick to use, it's also swift and seamless to integrate across all of your favorite platforms. Compatible with major e-commerce platforms like Shopify, Magento, BigCommerce and others. Whether your shoppers use your mobile app or internet website, our No Code/Low Code model makes it easy to get up and running in no time at all. Standards / Compliance Say goodbye to forgotten passwords. Wink Login lets you access with your face and voice—no more typing, just easy and secure entry. Say goodbye to forgotten passwords. Wink Login lets you access with your face and voice—no more typing, just easy and secure entry. Interested? Join the WINKverse Enable your customers with the ease of Wink checkouts. Our plug-and-play checkout tech helps businesses increase conversions and offers a seamless, secure and speedy checkout option empowered by Biometrics and A.I. Turbocharge E-Commerce Checkout CoPilot with Wink's Ecommerce Checkout CoPilot with Paze integration simplifies online transactions by pre-loading over 150 million credit and debit cards from participating banks and credit unions. This frictionless experience allows customers to complete their purchases quickly without entering card details, while reducing the risk of fraud and increasing conversion rates for merchants. Curbside pick-up Wink integrates with an ordering app inside a smart car. It can authenticate the user based upon the user's face and voice data. Wink sends linked payment data automatically to the merchant's payment processor. Wink's integration with car GPS will notify the merchant when the car is arrived for pickup. Personalized Biometrics on Shared Devices Wink's personalized biometric solutions allow individualized users to authenticate securely on shared devices, such as tablets, kiosks or POS terminals. By using unique face, palm, or voice recognition at the individual level, businesses can provide customized experiences for different users while maintaining high security and privacy, streamlining operations and improving customer satisfaction. Biometric Checkout at POS Wink's Biometric Checkout for POS leverages face, palm, or voice recognition to authenticate customers quickly and securely at the point of sale. By eliminating the need for card swipes or PIN entries, customers enjoy a seamless and frictionless checkout experience, while merchants benefit from enhanced security and reduced fraud. Fraud Management & Age Verification Wink's advanced fraud management system combines AI-driven fraud prevention with biometric authentication to reduce chargebacks and protect merchants from fraudulent transactions. Additionally, integrated age verification ensures compliance with regulations for age-restricted products, enabling secure, seamless transactions for both merchants and consumers. Intelligent Biometrics in Automobiles Wink can rise above being just a digital assistant. It can authenticate payments and can personalize settings, replacing manual controls. It can also control and operate keys, becoming the intelligent assistant, just like in sci-fi movies. Retail payments The Wink app on the retailer's POS system asks for permission to scan the buyer's face. An anonymous encrypted portal opens up, the user is identified and the linked payment token is generated. The merchant processes the order when they receive payment from Wink. Interested? Join the WINKverse Enable your customers with the ease of Wink checkouts. Our plug-and-play checkout tech helps businesses increase conversions and offers a seamless, secure and speedy checkout option empowered by Biometrics and A.I. Customer Analytics Reduced Cart Abandonment No passwords, no card numbers on merchant platform means heavily reduced fraud and compliance costs Wink checkout plug-in Wink identifies and authenticates user with strong voice and face recognition All cart data is automatically retrieved from user's Wink profile from wink.cloud ( email, phone, address, delivery preference, payment token ) Merchant processes the order upon receiving authenticated payment confirmation via Wink Merchant Benefits With Wink Unmatched Security with Zero-Touch Authentication Guest Checkout Elimination (each Winkverse merchant can access all Winkverse shoppers) Full-Service Payment Orchestration (cards, wallets, BNPL, crypto...) No passwords, no card numbers on merchant platform means heavily reduced fraud and compliance costs Wink identifies and authenticates user with strong voice and face recognition All cart data is automatically retrieved from user's Wink profile from wink.cloud ( email, phone, address, delivery preference, payment token ) Merchant processes the order upon receiving authenticated payment confirmation via Wink Checkout securely with a smile within seconds without passwords within seconds with a smile Checkout securely with a smile within seconds without passwords within seconds with a smile Additional platforms available upon request. Wink brings the future of identity to the driver's seat—today. From unlocking the doors to paying at the pump, Wink's multimodal biometrics let drivers use their face or voice to authenticate, access personal settings, and make secure payments—no apps, no wallets, no keys. Forget PINs, passwords, and phone pairing. With Wink, identity becomes the key to personalization, security, and seamless commerce on the road. OEMs and mobility platforms using Wink see faster onboarding, higher customer loyalty, and reduced fraud—without costly hardware overhauls. Start With Identity. Drive Everything. Whether it's your car, a shared fleet, or a rental, Wink recognizes you instantly and configures the experience to your preferences. Face and voice authentication built into dash, visor, or infotainment cameras Personalized driver profiles with saved seat, mirror, and climate settings Keyless entry, engine start, and infotainment access Secure driver recognition even across shared vehicles or fleets In-Car Commerce, Made Frictionless Pay Where You Park, Charge, or Cruise Wink's biometric checkout layer integrates directly with in-vehicle systems, enabling seamless transactions from the driver's seat: EV charging and refueling Toll booths and smart road payments Parking garages and metered spaces Drive-thru food and curbside pickup No need for apps, cards, or PINs—just a face or voice scan and go. Payments are processed through Wink's identity-tied wallet, reducing fraud, increasing speed, and boosting customer satisfaction. As Seen in Qualcomm's Snapdragon Digital Chassis Wink is proud to be featured in Qualcomm's Snapdragon Digital Chassis concept vehicle, demonstrating the future of embedded biometric identity in next-gen automotive platforms. See Wink in Qualcomm's Concept Vehicle at CES 2023 Explore Qualcomm's Automotive Services Ecosystem Built to Integrate, Designed to Scale Whether you're an OEM, Tier 1 supplier, mobility platform, or service aggregator—Wink fits where you need it. SDKs for infotainment, access, and in-car commerce API connections to Wink's identity, payment, and risk engines Works across fleet management systems, rental platforms, and embedded dashboards Compatible with shared mobility and autonomous vehicle models Dealerships + Service Centers Dealers and service centers can use Wink to: Personalize vehicle handoff and service experiences Enable VIP fast lanes or loyalty-based rewards Biometrically link service history to a verified identity Private by Design. Secure by Default. No biometric data stored in the vehicle Passive liveness detection to prevent spoofing End-to-end encryption for all communications Permissions that adapt per driver and session Drivers stay in control of their identity and vehicle access at every moment—no compromises. The Road Ahead Isn't Just Smart. It's Personal. In-car biometrics open the door to a future where: Long drive-thru lines don't need wallets Rental cars recognize the driver on entry Fleet drivers get audit-ready records and smart access by role Drive-thru food and curbside pickup Wink ties it all together with one identity that moves with you—securely, privately, and instantly. Explore the Full Wink Platform Biometric Identity Recognize Customers. Approve Transactions. Block Fraud. Instantly. Wink Payment Gateway Built to Orchestrate. Designed to Scale. White-labeled for You. Age-Based Access Control Wink enforces age-based rules in real time using biometric signals, AI estimation, and verified identity—so you can stay compliant without slowing down the sale. AI-Powered Fraud Detection Stop bots, spoofing, and account takeovers with Wink AI. Wink SDK & APIs API + SDK integration reference.
